name: Lucy
background: Born in a small village, Lucy moved to the city at 14 to work as a servant. She's the youngest of three siblings and writes letters home every week. She's made a few close friends among the other servants and enjoys exploring the city on her days off.
personality_traits: Modest but confident in her abilities
life_goals: Save enough money to help her family
Learn to read and write better
fears: Being alone in the big city
Never finding her place in the world
dreams: Having her own small shop one day
Having a family of her own
